system:
note description: "[ Wrapper class for GInputStream http://developer.gnome.org/gio/unstable/GInputStream.htmlhttp://developer.gnome.org/gio/unstable/GInputStream.html ]" date: "$Date: 2014-09-22 06:12:29 -0700 (Mon, 22 Sep 2014) $" revision: "$Revision: 95779 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xmlEV_G_INPUT_STREAM
inherit FalseDISPOSABLE
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_new_from_datanew_from_data
feature {NONE} --Initilization
f_new_from_data../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_new_from_datanew_from_data (a_data: FalsePOINTER; a_size: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Creation method local l_pixel_buffer: FalsePOINTER do l_pixel_buffer := ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_c_g_memory_input_stream_new_from_datac_g_memory_input_stream_new_from_data (a_data, a_size) check created: l_pixel_buffer /= Falsedefault_pointer end create ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_internal_iteminternal_item.Falseshare_from_pointer (l_pixel_buffer, ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_c_sizec_size) end
feature -- Query
f_item../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_itemitem: FalsePOINTER -- C item do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_internal_iteminternal_item.Falseitem end
f_is_closed../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_is_closedis_closed: FalseBOOLEAN -- Checks if an input stream is closed. local l_result: FalseINTEGER_32 l_item: like ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_itemitem do l_item := ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_itemitem if l_item /= Falsedefault_pointer then l_result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_c_g_input_stream_is_closedc_g_input_stream_is_closed (l_item) else check should_not_happen: False end end Result := (l_result /= 0) end
feature -- Command
f_dispose../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_disposedispose -- Action to be executed just before garbage collection -- reclaims an object. -- Effect it in descendants to perform specific dispose -- actions. Those actions should only take care of freeing -- external resources; they should not perform remote calls -- on other objects since these may also be dead and reclaimed. local l_item: like ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_itemitem l_error: FalsePOINTER l_result: FalseINTEGER_32 do l_item := ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_itemitem if l_item /= Falsedefault_pointer then l_result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_c_g_input_stream_closec_g_input_stream_close (l_item, Falsedefault_pointer, $l_error) else check should_not_happen: False end end check success: l_result /= 0 end end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_internal_item../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_internal_iteminternal_item: FalseMANAGED_POINTER -- C item
feature {NONE} -- Externals
f_c_size../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_c_sizec_size: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Size of G_INPUT_STREAM external "C inline use <ev_gtk.h>" alias "[ { #if GTK_MAJOR_VERSION > 1 && GTK_MINOR_VERSION > 13 return sizeof (GInputStream); #endif } ]" end
f_c_g_memory_input_stream_new_from_data../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_c_g_memory_input_stream_new_from_datac_g_memory_input_stream_new_from_data (a_data: FalsePOINTER; a_size: FalseINTEGER_32): FalsePOINTER -- Creates a new GMemoryInputStream with data in memory of a given size. -- a_data: input data. [array length=len][element-type guint8] -- a_len: length of the data, may be -1 if data is a nul-terminated string external "C inline use <ev_gtk.h>" alias "[ { #if GTK_MAJOR_VERSION > 1 && GTK_MINOR_VERSION > 13 return g_memory_input_stream_new_from_data ((const void *)$a_data, (gssize)$a_size, NULL); #endif } ]" end
f_c_g_input_stream_close../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_c_g_input_stream_closec_g_input_stream_close (a_input_stream: FalsePOINTER; a_cancellable: FalsePOINTER; a_error: FalseTYPED_POINTER [FalsePOINTER]): FalseINTEGER_32 -- Closes the stream, releasing resources related to it. -- a_stream : A GInputStream. -- a_cancellable : optional GCancellable object, NULL to ignore. [allow-none] -- a_error: location to store the error occurring, or NULL to ignore -- Returns: TRUE on success, FALSE (0) on failure external "C inline use <ev_gtk.h>" alias "[ { #if GTK_MAJOR_VERSION > 1 && GTK_MINOR_VERSION > 13 return g_input_stream_close ((GInputStream *)$a_input_stream, (GCancellable *)$a_cancellable, (GError **)$a_error); #endif } ]" end
f_c_g_input_stream_is_closed../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xml#f_c_g_input_stream_is_closedc_g_input_stream_is_closed (a_input_stream: FalsePOINTER): FalseINTEGER_32 -- Checks if an input stream is closed. -- stream: input stream. -- Returns: TRUE if the stream is closed. external "C inline use <ev_gtk.h>" alias "[ { #if GTK_MAJOR_VERSION > 1 && GTK_MINOR_VERSION > 13 return g_input_stream_is_closed ((GInputStream *)$a_input_stream); #endif } ]" end

end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_g_input_stream.xmlEV_G_INPUT_STREAM
